title: Snow Watch
summary: Happy Holiday! This is a wintet watch face for Android Wear.
description: Happy Holiday! This is a winter watch face for Android Wear.It is snowing! Snow Watch is an adaptation of Snow, an app written by Lim Ding Wen, a nine year old boy living in Singapore. It never snow in Singapore, so this is what Ding Wen thinks snowing looks like.If you like this watch face, please check out the following watch faces:★ Space Watch:   It is like having a little arcade game on your watch face!★ Invaders Watch: Space Invaders theme watch faces!
descriptionHTML:
Happy Holiday! This is a winter watch face for Android Wear.

It is snowing! Snow Watch is an adaptation of Snow, an app written by Lim Ding Wen, a nine year old boy living in Singapore. It never snow in Singapore, so this is what Ding Wen thinks snowing looks like.


If you like this watch face, please check out the following watch faces:
★ Space Watch: It is like having a little arcade game on your watch face!
★ Invaders Watch: Space Invaders theme watch faces!
comments: Nice Very nice watch face, could do with hands being darker or black , also digital clock at the bottom could do with being slightly bigger does not show up properly on Moto 360
I love it! However... I would not complain if the digital clock at the bottom was a little larger and higher because my watch cuts off the bottom
Snow falls on outside? On square face..
